biotools.summary:
Pharmosome: An Integrative and Collective Database for Explorations and Analysis of SNP Associated with Disease.

Today’s single nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) databases are limited to a narrow set of SNPs, which has led to a lack of interactivity between different databases, limited tools to analyze and manipulate the already existing data and complexity in the graphical user interface.
